casebody.data:
BETTS
v.
ARMSTRONG, et al. 260P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Amy Betts, for Betts, Amy. Tamie Jenkins-Rice, LeAnne Quattrucci, for Armstrong, Stephen Brett, et al. Cynthia L. Van Horne, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Costine, Eric.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of August 2017 by Respondents (Eric Costine and Edward S. (Ted) Shapack) to Dismiss Petition for Writ of Certiorari and Writ of Prohibition:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."
